snippet: Mitt Romney may have won the Iowa caucuses, but Rick Santorum appears to be seeing the largest improvement in the polls.
abstract: Mitt Romney may have won the Iowa caucuses, but Rick Santorum appears to be seeing the largest improvement in the polls.
lead_paragraph: The bounce that candidates receive in the polls after a primary or caucus is typically as much a function of exceeding expectations as their actual performance. Although Mitt Romney won the Iowa caucuses by eight votes, it looks as though Rick Santorum will see the largest improvement in his poll numbers.

headline.main: First Post-Iowa Polls Show Bounce for Santorum
